name: Into The Noid
description:
Welcome to a visual and atmospheric, Noid-like arcade experience in this classical brick-breaker genre turned VR.

Including physics-based gameplay and a cerebral visual experience through a host of 16 diverse and atmospheric, stylized levels.

Simple mechanics make for an enjoyable game that's also skill based. It starts as a relaxing, colourful VR romp that's casual then demands higher levels of skill from the player, eventually evolving into a brick-breaker that is as challenging as it is fun. Walls slide closer to the player, multiple balls appear, explosive balls help destroy the bricks while bonuses in the form of extra lives, larger and dual paddles fly at the player.

The levels are visceral and the environments provide ample food for the senses.
